verses.verse: And he commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the steward of his house <S%H1004><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Fill <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8761><s%> the men's <S%H582><s%> sacks <S%H572><s%> with food <S%H400><s%>, as much as <S%H834><s%> they can <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> carry <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8798><s%> every man's <S%H376><s%> money <S%H3701><s%> in his sack's <S%H572><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

And put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my cup <S%H1375><s%>, the silver <S%H3701><s%> cup <S%H1375><s%>, in the sack's <S%H572><s%> mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the youngest <S%H6996><s%>, and his corn <S%H7668><s%> money <S%H3701><s%>. And he did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> according to the word <S%H1697><s%> that Yosef <S%H3130><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8765><s%>.
As soon as the morning <S%H1242><s%> was light <S%H215><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, the men <S%H582><s%> were sent away <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8795><s%>, they and their asses <S%H2543><s%>.

And when they were gone out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8804><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, and not yet far off <S%H7368><s%> <S%H8689><s%>, Yosef <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto his steward <S%H1004><s%>, Up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, follow <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8798><s%> after <S%H310><s%> the men <S%H582><s%>; and when thou dost overtake <S%H5381><s%> <S%H8689><s%> them, say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto them, Wherefore have ye rewarded <S%H7999><s%> <S%H8765><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> for good <S%H2896><s%> ?

Is not this it in which my lord <S%H113><s%> drinketh <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and whereby indeed <S%H5172><s%> <S%H8763><s%> he divineth <S%H5172><s%> <S%H8762><s%>? ye have done evil <S%H7489><s%> <S%H8689><s%> in so doing <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.
And he overtook <S%H5381><s%> <S%H8686><s%> them, and he spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto them these same <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%>.

And they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, Wherefore saith <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%> these words <S%H1697><s%>? 'Elohim forbid <S%H2486><s%> that thy servants <S%H5650><s%> should do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> according to this thing <S%H1697><s%>:

Behold, the money <S%H3701><s%>, which we found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in our sacks <S%H572><s%> ' mouths <S%H6310><s%>, we brought again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8689><s%> unto thee out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>: how then should we steal <S%H1589><s%> <S%H8799><s%> out of thy lord's <S%H113><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> or gold <S%H2091><s%> ?
With whomsoever of thy servants <S%H5650><s%> it be found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, both let him die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and we also will be my lord's <S%H113><s%> bondmen <S%H5650><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Now also let it be according unto your words <S%H1697><s%>: <S%H3651><s%> he with whom it is found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8735><s%> shall be my servant <S%H5650><s%>; and ye shall be blameless <S%H5355><s%>.

Then they speedily <S%H4116><s%> <S%H8762><s%> took down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8686><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his sack <S%H572><s%> to the ground <S%H776><s%>, and opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8799><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his sack <S%H572><s%>.

And he searched <S%H2664><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, and began <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8689><s%> at the eldest <S%H1419><s%>, and left <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8765><s%> at the youngest <S%H6996><s%>: and the cup <S%H1375><s%> was found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in Binyamin's <S%H1144><s%> sack <S%H572><s%>.

Then they rent <S%H7167><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their clothes <S%H8071><s%>, and laded <S%H6006><s%> <S%H8799><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his ass <S%H2543><s%>, and returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to the city <S%H5892><s%>.

And Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> and his brethren <S%H251><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Yosef's <S%H3130><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>; for he was yet there: and they fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before him <S%H6440><s%> on the ground <S%H776><s%>.

And Yosef <S%H3130><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, What deed <S%H4639><s%> is this that ye have done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%>? wot ye <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not that such a man <S%H376><s%> as I can certainly <S%H5172><s%> <S%H8763><s%> divine <S%H5172><s%> <S%H8762><s%> ?

And Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, What shall we say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto my lord <S%H113><s%>? what shall we speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%>? or how shall we clear ourselves <S%H6663><s%> <S%H8691><s%>? 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath found out <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of thy servants <S%H5650><s%>: behold, we are my lord's <S%H113><s%> servants <S%H5650><s%>, both we, and he also <S%H1571><s%> with whom <S%H834><s%> <S%H3027><s%> the cup <S%H1375><s%> is found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, 'Elohim forbid <S%H2486><s%> that I should do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> so <S%H2063><s%>: but the man <S%H376><s%> in whose hand <S%H3027><s%> the cup <S%H1375><s%> is found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, he shall be my servant <S%H5650><s%>; and as for you, get you up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8798><s%> in peace <S%H7965><s%> unto your father <S%H1><s%>.

Then Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> came near <S%H5066><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Oh <S%H994><s%> my lord <S%H113><s%>, let thy servant <S%H5650><s%>, I pray thee, speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> a word <S%H1697><s%> in my lord's <S%H113><s%> ears <S%H241><s%>, and let not thine anger <S%H639><s%> burn <S%H2734><s%> <S%H8799><s%> against thy servant <S%H5650><s%>: for thou art even as Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%>.
My lord <S%H113><s%> asked <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his servants <S%H5650><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, Have <S%H3426><s%> ye a father <S%H1><s%>, or a brother <S%H251><s%> ?

And we said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto my lord <S%H113><s%>, We have <S%H3426><s%> a father <S%H1><s%>, an old man <S%H2205><s%>, and a child <S%H3206><s%> of his old age <S%H2208><s%>, a little one <S%H6996><s%>; and his brother <S%H251><s%> is dead <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and he alone is left <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8735><s%> of his mother <S%H517><s%>, and his father <S%H1><s%> loveth <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him.

And thou saidst <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, Bring him down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8685><s%> unto me, that I may set <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%> upon him.

And we said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto my lord <S%H113><s%>, The lad <S%H5288><s%> cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> leave <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8800><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>: for if he should leave <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8804><s%> his father <S%H1><s%>, his father would die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

And thou saidst <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto thy servants <S%H5650><s%>, Except <S%H3808><s%> your youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> come down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with you, ye shall see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H3254><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> no more <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.

And it came to pass when we came up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto thy servant <S%H5650><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>, we told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him the words <S%H1697><s%> of my lord <S%H113><s%>.
And our father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Go again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and buy <S%H7666><s%> <S%H8798><s%> us a little <S%H4592><s%> food <S%H400><s%>.

And we said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, We cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> go down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: if our youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> be <S%H3426><s%> with us, then will we go down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: for we may <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the man's <S%H376><s%> face <S%H6440><s%>, except <S%H369><s%> our youngest <S%H6996><s%> brother <S%H251><s%> be with us.

And thy servant <S%H5650><s%> my father <S%H1><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto us, Ye know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that my wife <S%H802><s%> bare <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me two <S%H8147><s%> sons:

And the one <S%H259><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from me, and I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Surely <S%H2963><s%> <S%H8800><s%> he is torn in pieces <S%H2963><s%> <S%H8776><s%>; and I saw him <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not since <S%H2008><s%>:

And if ye take <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8804><s%> this also from <S%H5973><s%> me <S%H6440><s%>, and mischief <S%H611><s%> befall him <S%H7136><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, ye shall bring down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8689><s%> my gray hairs <S%H7872><s%> with sorrow <S%H7451><s%> to the grave <S%H7585><s%>.

Now therefore when I come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> to thy servant <S%H5650><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>, and the lad <S%H5288><s%> be not with us; seeing that his life <S%H5315><s%> is bound up <S%H7194><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in the lad's life <S%H5315><s%>;

It shall come to pass, when he seeth <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> that the lad <S%H5288><s%> is not with us, that he will die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: and thy servants <S%H5650><s%> shall bring down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8689><s%> the gray hairs <S%H7872><s%> of thy servant <S%H5650><s%> our father <S%H1><s%> with sorrow <S%H3015><s%> to the grave <S%H7585><s%>.

For thy servant <S%H5650><s%> became surety <S%H6148><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for the lad <S%H5288><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, If I bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him not unto thee, then I shall bear the blame <S%H2398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to my father <S%H1><s%> for ever <S%H3117><s%>.

Now therefore, I pray thee, let thy servant <S%H5650><s%> abide <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> instead of the lad <S%H5288><s%> a bondman <S%H5650><s%> to my lord <S%H113><s%>; and let the lad <S%H5288><s%> go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with his brethren <S%H251><s%>.

For how <S%H349><s%> shall I go up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to my father <S%H1><s%>, and the lad <S%H5288><s%> be not with me? lest peradventure I see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> that shall come on <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my father <S%H1><s%>.
